00025 #ifndef __L4_KTRACE_EVENTS_H__
00026 #define __L4_KTRACE_EVENTS_H__
00027 
00028 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00029 
00030 enum
00031 {
00032     l4_ktrace_tbuf_unused             = 0,
00033     l4_ktrace_tbuf_pf                 = 1,
00034     l4_ktrace_tbuf_ipc                = 2,
00035     l4_ktrace_tbuf_ipc_res            = 3,
00036     l4_ktrace_tbuf_ipc_trace          = 4,
00037     l4_ktrace_tbuf_ke                 = 5,
00038     l4_ktrace_tbuf_ke_reg             = 6,
00039     l4_ktrace_tbuf_unmap              = 7,
00040     l4_ktrace_tbuf_shortcut_failed    = 8,
00041     l4_ktrace_tbuf_shortcut_succeeded = 9,
00042     l4_ktrace_tbuf_context_switch     = 10,
00043     l4_ktrace_tbuf_exregs             = 11,
00044     l4_ktrace_tbuf_breakpoint         = 12,
00045     l4_ktrace_tbuf_trap               = 13,
00046     l4_ktrace_tbuf_pf_res             = 14,
00047     l4_ktrace_tbuf_sched              = 15,
00048     l4_ktrace_tbuf_preemption         = 16,
00049     l4_ktrace_tbuf_ke_bin             = 17,
00050     l4_ktrace_tbuf_dynentries         = 18,
00051     l4_ktrace_tbuf_max                = 0x80,
00052     l4_ktrace_tbuf_hidden             = 0x80,
00053 };
00054 
00055 // IA-32 typedefs...
00056 typedef void               Context; // We don't have a class Context
00057                                     // here...  But that's fine, we
00058                                     // can calculate the taskid and
00059                                     // the threadid from this void
00060                                     // pointer...
00061 typedef void               Space;
00062 typedef void               Sched_context;
00063 typedef l4_fpage_t         L4_fpage;
00064 typedef unsigned long      Address;
00065 typedef unsigned long      Mword;
00066 typedef Mword              L4_error;
00067 typedef unsigned int       L4_snd_desc;
00068 typedef unsigned int       L4_rcv_desc;
00069 typedef unsigned long      L4_msg_tag;
00070 typedef unsigned long      L4_obj_ref;
00071 typedef l4_timeout_t       L4_timeout_pair;
00072 typedef unsigned char      Unsigned8;
00073 typedef unsigned short     Unsigned16;
00074 typedef unsigned int       Unsigned32;
00075 typedef unsigned long long Unsigned64;
00076 
00077 typedef struct __attribute__((packed))
00078 {
00079   Mword      number;                    // event number
00080   Mword      ip;                        // instruction pointer
00081   Context  * context;                   // current Context
00082   Unsigned64 tsc;                       // time stamp counter
00083   Unsigned32 pmc1;                      // performance counter 1
00084   Unsigned32 pmc2;                      // performance counter 2
00085   Unsigned32 kclock;                    // lower 32 bit of kernel clock
00086   Unsigned8  type;                      // type of entry
00087   Unsigned8  cpu;                       // cpu
00088   union __attribute__((__packed__))     // event specific data
00089     {
00090       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00091         {
00092           Address     _pfa;           
00093           Mword       _error;         
00094           Space       *_space;
00095 
00096         } pf;  // logged page fault
00097       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00098         {
00099           L4_msg_tag  _tag;           
00100           Mword       _dword[2];      
00101           L4_obj_ref  _dst;           
00102           Mword       _dbg_id;
00103           Mword       _label;
00104           L4_timeout_pair _timeout;   
00105         } ipc;  // logged ipc
00106       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00107         {
00108           Unsigned64  _snd_tsc;       
00109           L4_msg_tag  _result;        
00110           L4_obj_ref  _snd_dst;       
00111           Mword       _rcv_dst;       
00112           Unsigned8   _snd_desc;
00113           Unsigned8   _rcv_desc;
00114 
00115         } ipc_res;  // logged ipc result
00116       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00117         {
00118         } ipc_trace;  // traced ipc
00119       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00120         {
00121           char msg[30];
00122         } ke;   // logged kernel event
00123       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00124         {
00125           char msg[18];
00126           Mword vals[3];
00127         } ke_reg;  // logged kernel event plus register content
00128       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00129         {
00130           char     _pad[3];
00131           L4_fpage fpage;
00132           Mword    mask;
00133           int      result;  // was bool
00134         } unmap;  // logged unmap operation
00135       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00136         {
00137           // fixme: this seems unused in fiasco
00138         } shortcut_succeeded;  // logged short-cut ipc succeeded
00139       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00140         {
00141           Context const *_dst;                
00142           Context const *_dst_orig;
00143           Address     _kernel_ip;
00144           Mword       _lock_cnt;
00145           Space       *_from_space;
00146           Sched_context *_from_sched;
00147           Mword       _from_prio;
00148         } context_switch;  // logged context switch
00149       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00150         {
00151           Address     _address;       
00152           int         _len;           
00153           Mword       _value;         
00154           int         _mode;          
00155 
00156         } breakpoint;  // logged breakpoint
00157       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00158         {
00159           char       trapno;
00160           Unsigned16 _errno;
00161           Mword      ebp;
00162           Mword      cr2;
00163           Mword      eax;
00164           Mword      eflags;
00165           Mword      esp;
00166           Unsigned16 cs;
00167           Unsigned16 ds;
00168         } trap;  // logged trap
00169       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00170         {
00171           Address     _pfa;
00172           L4_error    _err;
00173           L4_error    _ret;
00174         } pf_res;  // logged page fault result
00175       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00176         {
00177           unsigned short _mode;
00178           Context const *_owner;
00179           unsigned short _id;
00180           unsigned short _prio;
00181           signed long  _left;
00182           unsigned long  _quantum;
00183         } sched;
00184       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00185         {
00186           Mword        _preempter;
00187         } preemption;
00188       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00189         {
00190           Mword irq_obj;
00191           int irq_number;
00192         } irq;
00193       struct __attribute__((__packed__))
00194         {
00195             char _pad[30];
00196         } fit;
00197     } m;
00198 } l4_tracebuffer_entry_t;
00199 
00200 #endif
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
